_sText:
That is a big city where you can drive cars and 5 people can get in the same car.You own house or a parking without mods. Make a gang a kill to other people when friendly fire is on. I wanted make this mod becaouse we needed this in css. You will find the target of this map in the chat. It is difficult to explain becaouse there are a lot of details. Maybe you will not understand what I said in the video but you can do a route of the map.
fps >= 100

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EyC44bBCyeU

I make 100% this map also the models (bmw,nissan,...)
I will publish the models in this web side:
http://postimodels.blogspot.com.es/

Official group: http://steamcommunity.com/groups/cosmpolitanposti
Instructions: Copy this map at your map directory
